1.content:
You lay back in your chair on the deck of the ship. You bask in the warm sun, in your swim trunks and Hawaiian shirt. Your sure were lucky that you won that sweepstakes back home. The one that got you this vacation. The sea is a crystal blue, the sun is shining, the fish are jumping, the clouds are thundering.......Wait, Clouds?

You open your eyes and see some dark clouds on the horizon to the west. You can hear their booming thunder from here. You lay back in your chair, not worrying about it. It'll probably pass right over you, you think.

KATHOOM!

Lightning flashes through the sky, as the rain pounds on the ships deck. You were caught unaware by the storm, and try desperately to get to your cabin. You ran across the deck, slipping on the rain soaked surface. You are drenched, it'll take you weeks to get dried again. The storm churns the sea, waves rock the ship back and forth.

You crawl across the deck on your belly, trying to get back on your feet. Suddenly, a massive wave rams into the side of the ship, splashing over the deck, sweeping you away with it, across the deck, into the sea.

The waves toss you around through water like a rag doll. You open your mouth to yell for help, but it's filled with salty water. There's no hope for you now. Your vision begins to fade, as you sink below the waves. You stare at the rippling surface of the water as everything goes black.

Suddenly, you can breath again! You open your eyes. You're laying face down on an island beach, you lift your face out of the sand, staring at your surroundings. You have no idea where you could be. You didn't even know if there were any island nearby. On the edge of the beach is thick jungle.

You wobbly get up onto your feet and trudge across the beach, still soaking wet. The jungle is lush and humid, with many different animal calls sounding in the distance. You make your way through the jungle, pushing branches and brush aside.

Suddenly, as you step on a pile of palm leaves, you hear a loud cracking sound, as the leaves crumble beneath you, and you fall into a pit. Splintered bamboo and leaves lay all around you as look to the top. The pit is at least ten feet deep, and there is nothing you can use as footholds to climb out.

You sit at the bottom of the pit for over an hour, hoping someone comes and find you. Then you hear voices. "Hey! We caught something!" Staring down at you, is the strangest Creature you've ever seen. It is at least five feet tall, and appears to be a female. It was dressed in a grass skirt, and a leather bra. But the strangest thing, was that it appeared to be a skunk! Or at least, a skunk in a humanoid body.

Another one of the creatures appeared beside it, this one was a fox. They both carried spears, with golden spearheads. "What is it?" The fox asked to the skunk. "Whatever it is, it is'nt one of us. Therefore, we should take it to our ruler, and let her decide what to with it."

They tie a think vine around wrists, and pull you along with them. You forcefully follow them through the jungle, dreading what might become of you. Suddenly, the jungle breaks, opening a Aztec-like city. They continue to drag you through the city streets, which are populated by more of these furry beings, who stare at you, like they're never seen a human before.

They bring you to the steps of an enormous, grand palace, big enough to be a city on it's own. They drag you inside, to an elaborate throne room. They force you onto knees, facing the floor. "My empress." Says the skunk. "We captured this man in the jungle. What shall we do with him?"

"Bring him to me." You hear another voice say. You are forcefully shoved towards the throne. You stumbled as gaze up at the empress. It's another furry, at least five feet tall.

But, what furry is it.
1.title: The Island

1111.content:
You really didn't like how she had said "severely punished" as easily as she had, so you knew that at least for now it would be best to go along with what she wanted, you were far from home, and outnumbered, so as humbly as you could you slid down onto one knee and said "of course, my lady it would be an honour to serve you."

Sheila looked quite pleased with herself as she slowly stood up, "yes it is quite an honour to serve me" she says a small smile playing on her lips. She held her hand down to you, "you may kiss your mistress' hand to show your loyalty" she says. You take her hand and slightly lift your head so you can kiss it, having to stop yourself from trying to spit due to her fur. You saw Sheila's tail start to slowly sway behind her almost like it was a dog's as she reached down to caress your cheek. "very good, you will make a fine servant" she says. She lifts her head up and addresses the rest of the room "I am going to "test" how loyal my new servant is, I want absolute privacy, and am not to be disturbed" she says before gently tapping you on the shoulder, a sign for you to rise. She starts leaving the room giving no order for you to follow, you do so anyways, as you walked behind her you couldn't help but be entranced by her slender legs, her wide hips and her beautiful tail, all moving from side to side in perfect harmony. While your attention was focused on her well backside, you didn't see her take a glance backwards and smile slightly as she saw you were so enamoured by her body. After a minute of walking she pushes open a large mahogany door, taking a second to beckon you inside which you do.

The room before you was obviously Shela's bedroom, most of the wall opposite the door was taken up by a large 4-poster bed big enough for 3 people, as well as a small nightstand and a small bedside table. One wall was taken up by a dresser and a desk which flanked a small doorway leading out to an open balcony, the final door had a single mahogany door set in the exact middle "that is my personal bathroom, you and I will be spending a lot of "alone" time there as well as my bedroom" she says without you asking a question. She slowly and seductively walks over to the bed, her hips and tail swinging in that same perfect unison and this time she openly giggled as you gazed. You quickly stopped staring as it was obvious now that she knew you were staring, and you didn't want to be punished, but when you look at her she smiles slightly and waves one hand dismissively. "I don't mind if you stare" she states simply "in fact i'd be quite insulted if you didn't" she says. She sits down on the bed and pats a spot right next to her "come sit with me" she says, you slowly walk over and sit down next to her, nearly jumping out of your skin as you feel her body rest on yours.

"My lady?" you say a bit confused as to what she wanted you to do. Instead of asking you felt her simply hug herself closer to you, she gave off a small sigh as her weight gently pushed you back onto the bed, and seeing no reason not to, you moved a bit so the both of you were laying fully on the bed. "My lady, are you alright?" you say again, really confused as to what she wanted, she had isolated the two of you, made herself vulnerable, you weren't the biggest guy ever but you were bigger than her 5 foot frame.

After a few seconds Sheila speaks up "do you like me?" she asks. The question catches you completely off guard, and you look away for a few seconds, she sounds a little annoyed as she continues speaking "I said do you like me?" she repeats.

"You...you are a very beautiful vixen, my lady" you reply.

"Yes, I am, do you enjoy watching my cute butt and my luxurious tail sway side to side" she says, starting to run one clawed finger up and down your chest.

"Yes, my lady" you reply starting to blush.

"How about my figure, is it appealing?" she asks sitting up on your chest giving you a full view of her body. You weren't sure that your voice wouldn't betray you so you nod instead and she smiles reaching down to softly caress your cheek again. "I am most pleased that you're being so honest with me, and you're so obedient as well, if you keep this up you will be greatly rewarded" she says.

You slowly sit up a bit "my lady, is there anything you need?" you ask.

Sheila smiles "not at the moment, all I wish for is your company" she says. You nod slowly quite content with how things were working out at the moment, it wasn't like she was asking you to do anything difficult, all she was asking was for you to be near her. "I should inform you of a few things now, so you don't make any mistakes later" she says lightly stepping off you and sitting down so she was staring at you mostly eye-to-eye. "First, when you are bathing me, you always go with the flow of my fur, so from head to foot, this applies for when you are cleaning me, and brushing me. Second when you are drying me, you shall dry me as lightly as possible and again it shall be with the flow of my fur, I hate it when my fur gets all poofy. You will accompany me everywhere, and when I say everywhere I mean everywhere, if I am to deliver a speech you will be sitting next to my feet, if I must go to the bathroom you will be right outside waiting for me, do you understand so far?" she says. You nod , you didn't exactly like getting ordered around but you were appreciative she was telling you this now rather than expecting you to magically know it later.

"Do not think that just because you are my slave you will be treated poorly, you will have a special place next to me at the dinner table, and since you will always be in my company you will be privy to many of the island's most closely guarded secrets, however if you betray any of these responsibilities, you will not be severely punished, you will lose your head. Do I make myself clear" she says suddenly becoming very serious. You nod enthusiastically for some reason only in that moment did you understand how much trust she was putting in you. Sheila smiled "good, now for the special rules between you and me" she says.

"Between me and you, my lady?" you say.

Sheila smiles "yes rules for just when it is the two of us. Rule #1 when it is just us, you will call me Sheila, not my lady" she says. You nod your understanding, "rule #2, when I allow you to pet me, you may do so at your leisure as long as I enjoy it, although if you mess up my fur, I will expect you to put it back in place, your are also allowed to...explore me, although only for the purpose of finding where I enjoy being petted most" she says, and you nod again although you felt a little flustered. She looks around almost like she expected someone to be listening before continuing, "finally, as a woman, I have certain needs, at times I will ask you to fulfill these needs, at these times, your one objective is my pleasure, I shall not ask you to do anything disgusting but if I ask you to do something such as squeeze my breasts, you shall do so without hesitation, if I say harder you will do so, if I say faster you will go faster, do I make myself clear" she says. You nod slowly a little dumbfounded about what she had just said.

"My...Sheila, you'd wish for me to, lay with you?" you say.

Sheila nods "I still have needs, and as my servant you will be expected to fulfill those needs, however as queen I must keep up airs, so on pain of death you will tell no one of this" she says. You nod slowly telling her you understand her most important instruction before
1111.title: Of course, My Lady~!

112.content:
The empress vixen hummed and then, to every guard and servant's surprise, she rose from her throne and began to walk towards you. Immediately the skunk who held you started to object.

"My lady! You don't need to come forward to this weird creature!"

The vixen closed her eyes and sighed, waving off her loyalist's concerns. "Now now...this being is something new to this island. It appears to be male and humanoid too...except without fur. Interesting."

The vixen was now just feet from you. Although you were unsure of what was going to happen, you remained firm. Seeing her up close, you got a big idea of how big breasts were. She was unbelievably slim and stacked! Her breasts must be at least the size of her head...or even more. What was even crazier was that this empress was about six feet tall which brought your head about to her chest in comparison.

The express circled around you before she hummed and put a finger to her lips. She stared at you with narrowed eyes, almost as if trying to investigate him personally.

She smiled amused.

"You're not that muscular, aren't you? Tell me, what are you?" she questioned with curiosity brimming in her voice.

You raised an eyebrow. "I'm...um...human, maam..."

Suddenly, you felt a jab to your side. You gasped and fell to one knee. The skunk behind you seemingly hit you without warning.

"Call the empress before you correctly, scum!" she warned.

The empress narrowed her eyes at the skunk. "Now Mei, I would prefer if you not damage him. It did not seem he meant badly of me."

The skunk widened her eyes before leaned back and bowing.

"I'm sorry, my lady," she apologized.

You took note of the skunk's name. She was definitely quite the feisty one.

"I do believe the best thing we can do is give this person a home. You came afar, haven't you?" she asked.

You slowly rose, recovering from the skunk's jab. You didn't want to look back but you could practically feel the skunk glaring at you, clearing not trusting.

"I did...my lady. My boat crashed while I was on vacation," you answered, this time addressing properly for fear by getting hit by the skunk again.

The vixen chuckled. "I see. I do not know what you mean by 'vacation'. Regardless, you do not have to force yourself to address me properly. As the empress of this island, some of my loyalist can be a little over-protective."

"I...can see that," you answered, not daring to look at the skunk behind him.

"Well then, for someone unique as you. I feel it isn't proper to not welcome you warmly to our island. We take you in as a part of the anthro life that inhabits this island."

You widened your eyes. While you were happy to see that you weren't going to be in any danger, you knew that you couldn't stay on this island. Despite the humanoid animals with their fit and beautiful figures.

"Um...while I'm thankful. I would prefer to leave this island and go back home," you explained.

Sheila paused for a moment before her eyes softened and she gave a sad smile. "I'm afraid I cannot let you go. Even if you traveled her by accident, you're the first being we've seen that is humanoid and different from the rest. Do not be alarmed when I say that you've become a rather prized possession of this island."

You smiled to be polite but inside, you felt rather scared. Prized possession? Was he an item to them all?!

The vixen continued. "You will have to get used to your life here as there is no other options. We would prefer you not to decline as that would result in rather unfortunate events..."

You shivered and you could've sworn you heard some venom in her voice. You shakily nodded not wanting to seem disobedient.

The vixen smiled once again, happy that you agreed. "Excellent! Now I know the perfect place you can start settling in which is..."

After a moment of conversation, mainly more about your species the door opens with a quiet squeak. "M-Ma'am, we may have a problem." Looking you would see a, rather fluffy, anthro wolfess at the door... their outfit being any indication they were higher in status than some of the other guards you had seen.

"What is it Sarashi?" The empress would glance over, seeming partially annoyed by the disturbance... especially if it's going to be bad news...

"The chef managed to lose a finger my lady... lunch has been postponed to prevent contamination." The large wolf would bow. The look on your new mate's face would be one of exasperation as she slowly closes her eyes; somewhere in her own thoughts she would be trying to come up with a solution. As her eyes open she would be smiling, likely having devised a solution in the short silence.

"Let the chef get it checked out, and tell the prep staff to put together appetizers. The back-up chef should be here before the people are done with those and it will be like nothing happened... I also believe he should get a little compensation since he won't be able to use that hand for a while." Her smile would dim as she recalls once again how her guard had just barged in... "And knock next time please..." With that the guard would bow again and depart, closing the door behind her, and as it does the vixen turns to face you. "Now... where were we?"
11212112.title: Internal Affairs

112121121.content:
"I believe we were in the middle of a discussion... albeit I was too lost in your voice to hear the words." You smile, blushing gently. Wow you're a hopeless romantic, but it was true, and you couldn't remember anything other than that you two were now bound... mates, a form of marriage of two souls that now entwined the two of you forever- or until one of you died... She would look unperturbed however, smiling even at the remark before she finally responds.

"It's alright, if it is important I will remind you." She replies dismissively, but still caring as she begins to stand. "Would you like to join me on a walk? I hear the garden is lovely right now." She would extend a hand to you, finding you were having trouble getting out of her bed. Accepting the assistance you would take her hand- or paw?- and let her help pull you up, soon standing beside her as you now.

"It would be great to look around... I wasn't brought in under the best of circumstances after all..." A faint remembrance would hang in your tone, leaving her ears drooping somewhat... her tail less active as she silently stews over what to do about that, only to break her silence with a smile.

"Yeah, it's not the best of circumstances... but at least we got to meet, and now you are safe from them... I will keep you safe..." Ominous as that sounded you decide to put your faith in her, trusting her in this new and strange land to keep you safe and sound among all these strange creatures.

The queen replies, rising from her throne and slowly walking towards you - as she does so, you suddenly notice just how tall this 'Sebekali' really is: she easily towers over you by at least a couple of feet, and you're not exactly short. The empress leans down to get a better look at you, giving you a very nice view of her cleavage that you desperately try not to look at.
"You are a strange one, no doubt about that." She muses, cupping your chin and looking you over with what you could swear is a gleam of amusement in her yellow eyes. "But you are an interesting one nonetheless."
"Um, thanks?" You manage to say, mentally slapping yourself even as the words leave your mouth. Idiot! Could you have possibly sounded even more boring?!
"You are very welcome." Sebekali replies. She reaches behind your back; with a flick of her claws, your bonds are cut through, and the crocodile-woman offers you a hand to pull you up.
"Th-thank you, ma'am-uh, Your Highness." You hesitantly reply, accepting the extended hand and standing back up. Now that you're upright again, you can definitely confirm it: yep, she is definitely taller than you by at least a couple of feet, your eyes coming up just below her massive mammaries. You file away the question of how a reptile can even have those for another day and tear your eyes away from the empress' breasts to look up at her face - shockingly, she actually smiles a little bit at your slight blush.
"You are welcome, stranger." The crocodile woman replies. "Now, I believe that a more... proper introduction is in order. I am Empress Sebekali Aruwa, Thirty-sixth imperial ruler of the kingdom of Anthroparis. What is your name, strange one, and what manner of being are you?"
"Um, I-I'm... I'm John. John Harris, Jr." You manage to stammer out. "I'm a human."

Sebekali's eyebrows (Or, well, the ridges where her eyebrows would be) raise at this. "Really?" She asks, her curiosity piqued. "A human? And... where did you come from, if I may ask?"
"From the sea, Your Highness." You reply truthfully - you don't think that lying is going to go over well with this woman, especially considering all those teeth of hers. "I was out sailing, and a storm blew me here, wrecking my ship."

From behind you, Silona lets out a gasp, her spear clattering to the floor in shock. "Y-you mean...?" She asks.
The empress nods sagely. "So it seems. It is as the prophecy foretold: In the dawn of the thirty-sixth empress' reign, the son of Harris shall come from the sea and..."

info.brief_description: You are stranded on an island with Furry amazons, ruled by a empress
info.description:
Your boat is caught in a violent storm and you are thrown overboard. You wash up on a island, populated by furry amazons. The amazons ruled by their empress. Where the story goes, depends on who that furry is.

Some rules:

1. The main character must not be killed

2. You can have the empress be any species you want

3. At least a paragraph per chapter

4. Most of the amazons are five feet tall, there are a few that are bigger. The empress is always in the same size as the other amazons.

5. In most storylines, the males of the island are either slaves, hiding in the jungle, or non-existent. If there are males inhabiting the city, as citizens or not, make it evident early in the storyline

6. Sorry to any females reading this, but the main character is always males

7. Sex IS allowed (Rated 18+)

8. Have fun!


Reward: 1000 Gift Points per chapter


That's all for now. Enjoy!
